mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) num from jjg_fbgc_qlgc_sb_tqd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and fbgc = #{fbgc} GROUP BY qlmc
select DISTINCT(qlmc) qlmc FROM jjg_fbgc_qlgc_sb_tqd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
select COUNT(DISTINCT(zh)) FROM jjg_fbgc_qlgc_sb_tqd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
select COUNT(DISTINCT(zh)) FROM jjg_fbgc_qlgc_sb_tqd where proname = #{proname}
